name: item
description: Manipulate or copy items in the inventories of blocks (chest, furnaces, etc.) or entities (players or mobs).

list.name: give
list.description: Give the item to entities (players or mobs).

subcommand.name: target
subcommand.description: The entity to which the item is to be assigned.

list.name: spawn
list.description: Spawn the item at specific location.

subcommand.name: position
subcommand.description: The location where the item will appear.

args.name: component
args.description: The item's components (Sort of NBT Data).
